DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare rate long-term stent failure , define need repeat biliary intervention follow placement C-SEMS v U-SEMS palliation inoperable malignant distal bile duct obstruction .
DOC.brief_title: Covered v Uncovered Metal Stents Palliative Biliary Decompression Inoperable Malignant Distal Bile Duct Obstruction
DOC.criteria: distal bile obstruction refer ERCP intend palliative metal stent placement palliation jaundice 18 year age old serum bilirubin > 2mg/dL prior endoscopic percutaneous biliary drainage postsurgical anatomy primary site biliary obstruction involve common hepatic duct hilum tumor involve gastric outlet , duodenum , ampulla either preclude endoscopic access papilla otherwise prevent endoscopic biliary cannulation
